dialogues.speaker: Hank
lines: Alright, Goosey. This time, you're not alone.

dialogues.speaker: Hank
lines: Yepâ€”it's your first real race. Against other geese.

dialogues.speaker: Hank
lines: No pressure! They're just like you. Feathered, flappy, and mildly aggressive.

dialogues.speaker: Hank
lines: That's the spirit. First one to the finish wins. No shortcuts. No pecking.

dialogues.speaker: Hank
lines: Okay, maybe just a little pecking. Now get out there and make some feathers fly!
